item.title: Connectome Tutorials
item.description: This is a set of tutorials on how to use the connectome Hugo theme. The connectome Hugo theme is focusing on connecting notes with backlinks. Suppose a note A is linking to note B, note B should know that note A is linking to itself. In this setup, we immediately realize that we probably want to read about note A when viewing note B. The following is an example of such backlinks in this note [[Embed Articles]] Embed Articles Embed an article using the shortcode What is more, the connectome Hugo theme also provides a [[graph view of all the notes]] Graph of the whole knowledge base .
